fields.name: Booking Confirmation
fields.subject: Vroom Booking Confirmation
fields.body:
Booking Confirmation

Your booking has been confirmed.
If you would like to extend or cancel this booking, please login to the website.

 

Vehicle

{{ booking.vehicle }}

Location

{{ booking.vehicle.pod.description }}

Booking start

{{ booking.schedule_start }}

Booking end

{{ booking.schedule_end }}

fields.name: Booking Extended
fields.subject: Vroom Booking Extended
fields.body:
Booking Extended

Your booking has been extended.
If you would like to further extend or cancel this booking, please login to the website.

 

Vehicle

{{ booking.vehicle }}

Location

{{ booking.vehicle.pod.description }}

Booking start

{{ booking.schedule_start }}

Booking end

{{ booking.schedule_end }}

fields.name: Registration
fields.subject: Thank you for joining Vroom!
fields.body:
Hi {{ user.first_name }}!

Thanks for choosing Vroom as your preferred transport provider.
We look forward to giving you the best experience possible.

In order to ensure this email belongs to you, please click the link below to activate your account.

Activate Account

To get started head over to our How it Works section to get yourself informed
and start enjoying the benefits.

fields.name: Booking Cancelled
fields.subject: Vroom Booking Cancelled
fields.body:
Booking Cancelled

Your booking has been cancelled.
If this was in error, please login to the website and create another booking.

 

Vehicle

{{ booking.vehicle }}

Location

{{ booking.vehicle.pod.description }}

Booking start

{{ booking.schedule_start }}

Booking end

{{ booking.schedule_end }}

fields.name: Booking Invoice
fields.subject: Vroom Booking Invoice
fields.body:
Thank you!

A tax invoice for the below booking has been attached to this email.

Your credit card has already been charged, so you don't have to do anything.

If you believe there is an error, please contact us ASAP at enquiries@vroomcs.org

 

Vehicle

{{ invoice.booking.vehicle }}

Booking ended

{{ invoice.booking.ended }}

fields.name: Verify Email
fields.subject: Vroom - Verify Email
fields.body:
Hi {{ user.first_name }}!

You have requested to change your email address. To verify the new email address, please click the link below.

Verify Email

If you did not request this change, please ignore this email.
